item.title: What I’ve learned about using REDCap with R
item.description: When I started at my current job back fresh out of grad school in January 2015, I had only coded in SAS1 and the the lab I joined was storing data in SPSS spreadsheets–1 file for each patient (:scream:). As you can imagine, I needed to figure out something better and fast. Luckily, my institution had REDCap so I started getting us more organized by putting our data in a REDCap database.
